trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Huntsville
There were no other sightings in Huntsville on or around October 14th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi was standing at the at the back door looking up at the sky talking to my boyfirend, which was sitting in a chair cooking chicken on the bbq pit. all of the sudden i see a bright glare out of my peripheral vision and as i looked i saw a bright metallic silver cigar shaped object. i then st arted yelling for him to look up. all i could verbalize was "it has no wings"! as i started to lose sight of the ufo i turned and ran through the house to the front porch and watched the object until i could no longer see it. he believes that the object was twice as large as a fighter jet but was flying at least mach 2 at around 2\3 of the normal altitude of a fighter jet. he has always told me i was crazy. he was a true sceptic until that day. he said he does not know what it was but it was not a plane. we could not believe what we saw.!!
